channel.title: Jaime Cernuda
channel.description: Research on High-Performance Computing, Distributed Systems, and AI

item.title: RSS Test Post
item.description: This is a fake post to verify the RSS feed generation.

item.title: Reflections on defending my thesis in the age of LLMs
item.description: The landscape of academic research is shifting rapidly. As I stood before the committee, I couldn't help but wonder how generative AI will reshape the very definition of original contribution in computer science doctorates.

item.title: A deep dive into our latest CVPR paper on zero-shot learning
item.description: We proposed a novel framework for visual semantic embedding that outperforms current state-of-the-art models on generalized zero-shot learning tasks. Here is a breakdown of the math and the intuition behind the architecture.

item.title: How to manage burn-out as a research assistant
item.description: The pressure to publish can be overwhelming. During my third year, I hit a wall. Here are the strategies I used to recover my passion for discovery without sacrificing my mental health.
